          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Csak 1-2 percig lehetünk víz alatt</string>
            <string language="en-US">We can stay underwater for just 1-2 minutes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir können für gerade 1-2 Minuten Unterwasser 
bleiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous pouvons rester sous-marins pendant juste 1-2 
minutes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós podemos permanecer subaquáticos por apenas 
1-2 minutos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Possiamo rimanere subacquei per appena 1-2 minuti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορούμε να μείνουμε υποβρύχιοι για ακριβώς 1-2 
λεπτά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Podemos permanecer subacuáticos por apenas 1-2 
minutos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
